name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Myrtle Beach at 48th Avenue

reviews.text: This was my first time to Myrtle Beach as well as my first time staying at La Quinta. I was very surprised how ideal the location was and how short the walk was to the beach. I was surprised how updated the furnishings were at this hotel as welll. The pictures listed on LQ are accurate and they do have the most comfortable beds I have ever slept on.I actually wrote down the mattress manufacturer and model number I was so impressed.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised and Impressed

likes.liked: — LQ is on target with this hotel. Great furnishings and a ideal location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: My hotel stay was 01JUN08 - 04JUN08. My hotel stay was paid entirely through a priceline bid at $50.00/nt
reviews.title: A bit-above-average LaQuinta

aka: La Quinta Inn & Suites Myrtle Beach At 48th Avenue Hotel
